page.title: 19TRADE BEULAH -GARTH
page.content: Beulah - one general store, on old counter service principle, also sells newspapers. Garth - one new general food store, self service, opened July 1985, also sells newspapers. Small general shop on caravan park. One farm sells eggs by putting up notice in garden, one cottage also in Garth occasionally sells eggs and garden produce in same way. Butchers delivery vans come round twice weekly from Builth to Garth, and Llanwrtyd to Beulah. Ice-cream van tours round hoping for sale. Animal feeding stuffs depot in Garth. No deliveries, farmers collect their own orders. Marketing of animals mainly at Builth and Llanwrtyd weekly markets.
